WRITING.TITLE: Conqueror Charged Heavy Change
WRITING.TEXT:
So as many people know, the charged heavy is very rarely used on Conqueror. Reasons being it uses lots of stamina, is very telegraphed and easy to block or parry, and leaves you vulnerable to an uncounterable guard break. That's not very good for the trademark "Hard Hitting" move.
I propose that as the heavy attack charge level increases, it not only does higher damage on hit but also has faster attack speed. I feel this would work better than making it unblockable plus it makes sense from a logical point of view as well.
For instance, the heavy has 3 levels right? Normal, half charge, and full charge. Normal is as is. On half charge the attack would swing come out 33% faster, and full charge 50%. I'm not a numbers guy those are just rough ideas.
